select X.* from ( SELECT BOARD_MNG_NO, BOARD_MNG_CD, BOARD_NM, REPLY_FLG, FILE_ATTACH_FLG, NOTICE_FLG, ACTIVE_FLG, DEL_FLG, CREATED, if(ACTIVE_FLG='Y', '활성화', '비활성화') AS ACTIVE_FLGSTRING FROM tb_board_mng order by UPDATED DESC ) X LIMIT #{page.limitStartNum}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT A.BOARD_MNG_NO, A.BOARD_MNG_CD, A.BOARD_NM, A.REPLY_FLG, A.ACTIVE_FLG, A.FILE_ATTACH_FLG, A.NOTICE_FLG, B.CD_NM FROM TB_BOARD_MNG A , CODE B WHERE BOARD_MNG_NO = #{BOARD_MNG_NO} AND A.BOARD_MNG_CD = B.CODE AND B.CD_GRP_ID='BOG'

SELECT IF(SUBSTR(MAX(a.board_mng_no), 1, 3) = 'BMG', concat(SUBSTR(MAX(a.board_mng_no),1,3) , LPAD(SUBSTR(MAX(a.board_mng_no),4,3)+1, 3, '0')), concat('BMG','001')) board_mng_no FROM tb_board_mng a USE INDEX(PRIMARY)
